name: All Items
query:
select 
	item_code as 'Item Code:Link/Item:100',
	gst_hsn_code as 'HSN Code:Int:100',
	item_name as 'Item Name:Data:250',
	description as 'Description:Data:250',
	item_group as 'Item Group:Link/Item Group:150',
	brand as 'Brand:Data:150',
	stock_uom as 'UOM:Link/UOM:60',
	max_discount as 'Max Discount:Percent:100'
from `tabItem`;
